welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bignay, Philippines! Known for its charming beauty and rich culture, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here in Bignay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, this terminal primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving mainly international flights for Cebu Pacific and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, this terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout all terminals, but may be slow and unreliable at times.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
